info.name: Clean Facebook
info.description:
Removes useless and distracting elements from Facebook.

Increase your chances of seeing stuff that actually matters to you. However, this is not a magical style. Your chances of seeing interesting stuff will remain pretty low, because, you know... it's Facebook.
info.additionalInfo: Elements that are removed: - Ads+ - The new big "What's on your mind" text box in News Feed. You can still update your status from your profile page. - Trending articles, trending videos, etc. "Ads+", or just garbage, is how I call the distracting elements in the right column of the page, including: ads, sponsored stories, people you may know, suggested groups, list suggestions, etc. Updates 2012.07.06 - Ads+ are now removed from the whole site, not only from news feed and profile pages.
